animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am the largest land animal.
🚿 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I go 'Meow' and like to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🥛 I drink milk.
😴 I purr when I'm happy.

animal.question: I say 'Woof' and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to fetch.
🏡 I protect your house.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal.
🇿🇦 I live in Africa.
Spots cover my body.

animal.question: I quack and like to swim in ponds. What am I?

hints.text: 🥚 I lay eggs.
🌾 I eat bread crumbs.
🦆 My babies are called ducklings.

animal.question: I roar and am known as the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a mane.
🥩 I am a carnivore.
🐾 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I hop and carry my baby in a pouch. What am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I am from Australia.
🌱 I eat plants.
💪 I have strong legs for jumping.

animal.question: I slither and have no legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I can be venomous.
🐭 I eat small rodents.
👅 I flick my tongue to smell.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I am related to horses.
🌿 I eat grass.
🦓 My stripes help me camouflage.

animal.question: I am a slow-moving reptile with a hard shell. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can live for a very long time.
🥬 I eat plants.
🏜️ Some live in deserts, others in water.

cosmos.question: I am the star closest to Earth. I give you light during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot.
🌞 Plants need me to grow.
😎 You need sunglasses to look at me.

cosmos.question: I am Earth's natural satellite, and I shine at night. Sometimes I am full, sometimes just a sliver. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Some people think I am made of cheese.
🐺 Werewolves are sometimes associated with me.
🌊 I affect the tides of the oceans.

cosmos.question: I am the planet known for its beautiful rings. I am the sixth planet from the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
🌬️ I am a gas giant.
🪐 I'm quite large, but less massive than Jupiter.

cosmos.question: I am the red planet. I'm the fourth planet from the Sun and known for my rusty color. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I look like rust.
🚀 People send rovers to explore me.
👨‍🚀 Some day, humans might live there.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that form a pattern in the night sky. Some look like animals or people. What am I?

hints.text: ursa major 🐻 is a famous example.
✨ Connect the dots to see my shape.
🔭 Sailors used to use me for navigation.

cosmos.question: I am the largest planet in our solar system. I have a big red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 My red spot is a giant storm.
💨 I'm a gas giant.
🪐 I have many moons.

cosmos.question: I am a small, icy object that leaves a bright trail when I get close to the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I have a tail made of dust and gas.
❄️ I am made of frozen stuff.
✨ People make wishes when they see me.

cosmos.question: I am a huge collection of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular.
💫 Our one is called the Milky Way.
✨ There are billions of us in the universe.

cosmos.question: I am a cloud of gas and dust in space, often where new stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I come in many beautiful colors.
👶 Stars are born inside of me.
🔭 The Eagle and Orion are famous examples of me.

cosmos.question: I am what is left after a massive star explodes. I am very bright, but don't last forever. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I mark the death of a giant star.
🌟 I am much brighter than a regular star.
⚛️ The Crab is a famous example of me.
